# Exploring and Describing Data

Data are at the core of all statistical analyses. In this section you will learn about:

- The tabular data structure;
- Understanding your data including:
  + Classifying attributes;
  + Whether your data constitute the population of cases or a sample of cases;
  + Sampling methods for producing reasonable estimates 
- Visualizing distributions of data; and
- Numerically summarizing distrubtions of data.
